Apache Camel

Apache Camel endpoints can be integrated into Akka Stream applications with the Streamz library.

External library

This library is not maintained in the Alpakka repository. Learn more about it at

  • GitHub krasserm/streamz
  • Camel Scala DSL for Akka Streams
  • Camel Java DSL for Akka Streams

Apache Cassandra
